p.k: I, Butler / I Am Ice Bear / Bearz II Men / Crowbar Jones: Origins The Bears use a robot bear to help around the house. But things get tricky when they lose control of the robot. / After Ice Bear hits his head, Grizz and Panda notice him acting like a different person. / The Baby Bears help a teenager accomplish his dream of being a famous singer. / Grizz pitches his Crowbar Jones prequel film to Nom Nom, hoping Nom Nom will agree to appear in the movie.
